column3: Latest;Sihanoukville: Local media reports that at 1:20 pm on May 20
column5: a body was found in the sea close to Ochheuteal Beach
column6: Sangkat 4.------The corpse was of a man
column9: no shirt and was beginning to decompose.------Law enforcement are investigating. For now Khmer press say the body is unidentified
column10: but Chinese language news believe the man to be a Chinese national.------UPDATE: Named as  TANG SHAOEN
column12: a Chinese construction worker who had been missing for 3 days. Police ruled the death as a case of drowning
